'''I Am Speed''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete [[Urubamba]]'s [[Warrior's Challenge]] and achieve S grade or higher.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Little Lost Saurians]]'' must be completed to unlock Urubamba's Warrior's Challenge.
